title: Requires transparent methods of subcontracting by general contractors who enter public work contracts with the New York state dormitory authority
summary: Requires transparent methods of subcontracting by general contractors who enter public work contracts with the New York state dormitory authority.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to transparent methods of subcontracting by general contractors who enter public work contracts with the New York state dormitory authority
